| debug_fishing | 1 | debug fishing |

| debug_age | 10 | debug aging |
| debug_recruit | 11 | debug recruitment |
| debug_spawn | 12 | debug_spawning |
| debug_migrate | 13 | debug migration |
| debug_move | 14 | debug movement |
| debug_stock | 15 | debug stocks |
| debug_biom | 16 | debug biomass calcs |
| debug_eat | 17 | debug feeding |
| debug_general | 18 | debug everything |
| debug_biology_process | 20 | print the biology process function parameters |
| debug_prey_biology_process | 21 | print the biology process function parameter |
| clam_debug | 22 |  |
| debug_deposit | 23 | debug deposition |
| debug_mL | 24 | debug mortality scalar |
